description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:1. engineering of materials2. forming of materials 3. traditional casting processes4. broaching and sawing5. turning and boring6. drilling and reaming7. milling and grinding8. machine tools 9. nontraditional machining

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生了解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工級測量。
description.en: English Description  This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the modern manufacturing processed and machine tools. The course is designed principally to provide the following topics： 1. Engineering of materials 2. Forming of materials 3. Traditional casting processes 4. Broaching and sawing 5. Turning and boring 6. Drilling and reaming 7. Milling and grinding 8. Machine tools 9. Nontraditional machining

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。由於本系分兩組教學，因應之課程內容分別為：管理組：矩陣、方程式之解、行列式、向量、微分方程式及應用問題等。工程組：矩陣方程式之解、行列式、向量及向量空間等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the linear algebra by using several different methods to solve the linear dependent equations and to build up the fundamental knowledge of linear programming and Operation Research. Two groups instruct the contents of this course. For the engineering group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors, differential equations and its implementation are included. For the management group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors and vector spaces are included.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，組織與管理之重要理論，未來發展趨勢及理論與實務之配合技巧等。課程主要目的為：、啟迪管理哲學和觀念、以分組個案研討方式加強分析、解決問題及決策的能力，、以口頭報告來訓練表達和溝通能力，、訓練對企畫案及其他書面報告之寫作技巧，、塑造管理人員應具備的信念、特質、意志及工作倫理。
description.en: The course is to make the studendts realize :1.the progress of management,2.the important theories and the future,3.the applications technique,The objects of this course:1.realize the philosophy of management,2.emphasize the analysis ability of case studies,3.emphasize the problem-solving and decision-making abilities,4.the abilities of presentation and communication with oracle report,5.the abilities of project-writing,6.the abilities of a management manager supported to be,including belief,characters,wills and the working manners .

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理實習。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course let the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information system, information technology, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

name.en: Introduction to Industrial Engineering and Management

description.zh: 主要敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容包含：工業組織、人事管理、工廠規畫、成本分析與控制、工業設備、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全等，期使學生對工業工程與管理整體作業有一概括性的認識。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 介紹 C++ 語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language.  They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues.  Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 介紹工程及管理等相關套裝軟體之使用，以便應用此軟體工具處理相關資料，包含 Word Processor ， Word ， Lotus， Window ， SAS ， Power point 等。
description.en: Introduction to the software package frequently used, including MS Word, Excel, Power Point, etc.

description.zh: 電腦繪圖應用：本課程適用於一般大專之電腦繪圖課程。其目的在說明電腦繪圖原理之基本觀念，及其相關之應用。本課程授課主題包括：電腦繪圖系統簡介、二度空間轉換問題、視窗、繪圖區域之處理、互動式電腦繪圖系統設計、三度空間轉換問題、隱藏現方法。
description.en: Computer Graphics Applications： This is an undergraduate course dealing with computer graphics.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of computer graphics theory and its applications.The main topics of this course are introductionof computer graphic system,two-dimemtional transformation,windowing,segments,interactive graphic systemdesign,three-dimemtional transformation,hidden line methods.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 講授應用於工程上之經濟分析及決策理論，並介紹報酬率、現值、及資金成本之計算與分析。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and applications of engineering economics in the process of marketing strategy. The nature of remuneration, capital, and depreciation will be introduced and calculated in case examples.

description.zh: 探討家具成本之構成要素：原料、人力、製造及銷管費用等項；研究定價策略，計算損益平衡，分析並控制家具之製造成本。此外，亦將論及工程經濟，以便各種製造資源：原料、人力及機器獲得最經濟利用。
description.en: This course will acquaint the student with the techniques of pricing a piece of furniture including materials, labor, overhead, and administrative expenses. To calculate "Break-even" Point, to analyze and control cost elements of manufacturing furniture, with special emphasis on economic utilization of materials, manpower and machines.

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係在教導學生有關工業包裝，包裝材料之特性與運用、包裝之結構與試驗方法及包裝之標準化、運輸、管理等基本知識以及設計要領。
description.en: The aim of this course is to familiarize the students with the basic technology of industrial packaging,packaging engineering and packaging management and to train them in the techniques of protectional package design and managment so that they may continue their advanced study or apply what they learn to practice.

description.zh: 應用科學方法研究分析：人─環境之傳達模式，提高視覺及工作效率，減少災害發生機會，提高生活品質，連貫及涵蓋視覺平面、產品、建築及都市景觀等各種設計領域以整體觀點進行研究分析及個人的設計練習。
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below; 1. Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design 2. Rationale of the regional planning and design 3. The body of regional design in landscape 4. Method of regional approach to landscape design 5. The practice of regional landscape design

description.zh: 本課程為設計理論的講授，其內容包含溝通基本觀念、感知心理、記號理論、情報理論、傳達理論等之理論架構及應用模式。
description.en: The study of design methodology, including the theory structure and application module of the basic communication knowledge, conception psychology, symbolization theory, information theory and communication theory.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹設計實務工作的活動，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提交檢討。並以各專案實例說明設計的過程所遭遇之問題點，以及如何因應之道。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a design case, from proposal setup, achievement, management, negotiation and the final review, accompanying with the problems and solutions encountering in the actual projects.

description.zh: 以pentium級個人電腦搭配設計軟體之使用，了解3D高階軟體本身內部運作的結構與建構、更改模型的完整觀念，並了解同部工程中建構模型資料的方式。藉由實習培養學生從CAID到CAD/CAM的設計與開發能力。(本課程以Pro-Engineer軟體為例)
description.en: In this computer aided desigh course, we use Pwntium-class PC to run our design software. Our major point is to understansd how the kernel structure and construction of advances 3D software works; to build the complete idea of model's refinement, and to know the way of building model's data in Concurrent Engineering. We cultivate students' design and creating abilities from CAID to CAD/CAM by practices.(In this course we take Pro-Engineer as example)

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 根基於學生在基本產品設計的學習中所建立之基礎，漸次加深產品設計在工程技術條件的多元性。企業市場及消費者需求因素的複雜性，訓練學生以工業設計的方法與技術，在目標條件下解決由多元素及多因素所構成之產品設計問題，進而達成商品及產品造形之創新。
description.en: Based on the Basic Product Design Course, it aims to integrate Engineering, Marketing and Design in a single product design. You will be given a brief to design a particular product. The design that you develop will be expected to exhibit a good understanding of ergonomic, aesthetic and manufacturing considerations.

description.zh: 介紹傳統以及特殊加工法、製造法、金屬、非金屬材料之製造加工。
description.en: In the design and manufacturing of a product is is essential that the machine as wellas the process be understood, Manufacturing requires tools and machines that can produce products economically as well as accurately. Economy depends to a large extent on the proper selection of a machine or process that will give a satisfactory finished porduct. This course serves as an introduction to various manufacturing, foundry, special casting, and special working process.

description.zh: 包括應用力學與材料力學兩大部份。課程介紹應力概念、應力與應變、軸向與平面、扭轉、彎曲、樑的撓度、柱、能量方法等。
description.en: Topics covered in design kinematics and Materials phase include: Engineering Mechanics Dynamics, Motion, Vibration, Material Forming Process, Tension, Compression, Shear, Torsion, Bending, Beam, Buckling and Stability.Also included with in this category are the activities as sociated with the preparation of the preliminary brief and the conceptualisation of the problem sloution. The management category emphasises the inevstigation and interpretation of both management functions and principles.

description.zh: 行銷是由物品的流通及製造者對消費者或使用者所提供之服務等商業活動所構成的。包括產品、產銷地點、通路及價格等四個主要原理。行銷研究是幫助經營者去發展及研究市場並研擬更好之行銷計劃，包括四種主要活動：研究計劃、收集情報、分析及發表。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with knowledge of marketing, including product strategy, physical distribution, channel and pricing. Case study and discuss through activities (planning, investigation, analysis and presentation) that carry out strategic marketing are employed from time to time.

description.zh: 延續基本家具與室內設計的基礎教育,以創意的訓練為主.藉由對家具與室內設計空間之相關性的探討,透過實際設計程序的演練,培養解決問題的能力及習得設計的方法.
description.en: Through the operation of small furniture design,sophomirs will practice details of the design process,materials,and manufacturing process.Than by studying natural forms,seniors will use team work of design as the integration of this course in the last semester of thew second year.

description.zh: 本課程為產品設計專案程序之理論與實務設計與創造性思考，專案與程序，劇本法邏輯，目標澄清，設計研究與調查，構想展開與評估，細部改善，語意法，專案設計策略。
description.en: This course focuses on concept and methods on product design project. It includes: Design Logic, Scenario Planning, Expression, Legibility, Semantics, Problem Solving, Concept Generation Evolution, Technology and Market.

description.zh: 探討家具製造之最新技術，側重量產設備及其與產品工程的關係。介紹木材加工原理及最新量產設備之性能，以便依據家具特徵如組件形狀，材料性質，及產量多寡等考量，提出有效率的加工計畫（製造流程）。講授家具製造作業程序（從原料接受、備料、細作、裝配以迄塗裝、包裝、發貨等其間之種種細節），特別是以計量的觀點來看家具製造問題，以避免發生瓶頸，製造系統整体概念之培養，尤為重點。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering.This course provides students with an understanding of the principles of wood machining processes and the capabilities of modern production woodworking equipment. Students learn to develop efficient process plans (machining sequences) based on product characteristics such as part geometry, material composition, and production volume.Emphasis is on operations, and the integration of many types of equipment into a manufacturing system. This course specially requires the students to view the manufacturing process in quantitative terms.

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 以pentium級個人電腦搭配設計軟體之使用，了解3D高階軟體本身內部運作的結構與建構、更改模型的完整觀念，並了解同部工程中建構模型資料的方式。藉由實習培養學生從CAID到CAD/CAM的設計與開發能力。(本課程以Pro-Engineer軟體為例)
description.en: In this computer aided desigh course, we use Pwntium-class PC to run our design software. Our major point is to understansd how the kernel structure and construction of advances 3D software works; to build the complete idea of model's refinement, and to know the way of building model's data in Concurrent Engineering. We cultivate students' design and creating abilities from CAID to CAD/CAM by practices.(In this course we take Pro-Engineer as example)

description.zh: 透過多類型之作業演練，分析及探討由視覺衍生之知覺性及感情效果于平面設計上之影響，開發一套可供工業設計運用的基本視覺設計原裡。
description.en: Thuough multiple creative design projects, analyzing and discussing visual cognition affect graphic design work, Develop a basic system of visual communication usage for industrial design.

description.zh: 解說大型相機多重焦距調整和影像形狀的修正及變形功能,如何配合造型設計及啟發造形創意,使學生熟悉大型相機操作方式及攝影技巧,由忠實表現學生自己設計成品的表面材質感.形狀.體積.色彩等等,再深入到表現.特色.機能.價值感等發揮實用攝影行銷及展示的功效.
description.en: Through the detailed explanations of multiple focusing adjustments and image correcting methods of the view camera(large format camera)to help students master the operation of the camera and many other photo taking techniques.The students shall be able to take picture of their own designing product(showing the right material quality,surface texture,the form,volume,weight and color).Furthermore,the sturents are requested to learn,to make full use of their knowledge as to show the character,function,value and uniqueness of their product in the picture for the purpose marketing promotion and exhibition.

description.zh: 應用各種表現技法並使用CAD,多媒體等高科技手法,使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果.
description.en: Following ‘Design Presentation Techniques (I)and (II)’ the studio course aims to provide the student with design presentation techniques using computer as tools of simulation and presentation.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 探討各種家具材料之種類與特性，以木質材料為主，輔以金屬、塑膠、 玻璃、石材及其他配件，充分瞭解各種材料之優良特性，配合正確的加工方式及人性化設計，俾使家具產品於適當之使用環境下得以適材適用，發揮最大經濟效益。
description.en: Introduction to the varieties and characteristics of materials for making furniture. Wood material, the key portion of this course, includes the macrostructure and microstructure of wood, identification and uses of common softwoods and hardwoods, physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing, properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included, and accompanied with other materials such as metal, plastic, glass, stone and accessories. This course intends to survey the specific properties of various materials and right processing way to achieve the best economic benefits.

description.zh: 講授並整合產品設計之基本理論、方法及程序。藉設計題目之演練，以分組討論之方式，引導同學學習組織表達及分析思考之能力；並以個別指導之方式，引導同學磨練創意之思考及熟練之表達技巧。
description.en: This course intergral the theoretical principle methodology and the process of produces design Guide the design student to work on design projects through group discussion and individual practice with creative thinking and presentation technique.

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

description.zh: 教導學生認識色彩之成因及視覺現象、色彩系統之認識及色彩心理之種種現象。
description.en: Basic understanding about color. Including light, visual perception, color names, color order systems.

description.zh: 本課程重點在探討人們日常生活與工作時,置身其間的理想環境及適用的器物設備;在從事建築、室內及產品等環境相關設計時所應考慮的人體特徵、心理反應、動作行為及人類心理和生理上可承受的負荷,特別是人/環境系統間的相對配合問題,以獲得安全、效率與舒適為目的。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures. And then apply it to the design of architecture, interior, product, systems and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity. The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 從資料收集、分析、評斷、歸納、演繹至構想發展、構想表達、溝通及具體化與驗實，有系統介紹產品設計之理論及方法、程序及解決不同階段問題的技術與技巧，以加強設計工作之效率與效益。
description.en: This course contains a collection of fifteen design methods that student might find useful at various states of a design project. Design methods are tools or techniques for conducting design projects. Student will have to pick and choose amongst them to construct their own design process using their own imagination and preferred ways of working, as well as the methods themselves. No matter of what types of project in mind, student should be able to find the methods at least one or two ,at the will help them to get started, to keep going, to change direction or to finish.

description.zh: 延續基本設計的基礎教育,以創意的訓練為主.藉由對家具與室內設計空間之相關性的探討,透過實際設計程序的演練,培養解決問題的能力及習得設計的方法.
description.en: Through the operation of small furniture design,sophomirs will practice details of the design process,materials,and manufacturing process.Than by studying natural forms,seniors will use team work of design as the integration of this course in the last semester of thew second year.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en: To practice product model building techniques . Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 以工作站級電腦輔助工業設計軟體 Microstation 之使用為主，教授學生基本模型之建立方法，並介紹單一模型之材質著色及場景營造方式，進而教授動畫之製作方式，以此為主題使學生能將模型以更活潑的動畫方式呈現。
description.en: The study of computer workstation industrial aided design software, Microstation, emphasizing on the models construction, materials editing, scene planning and animation, to present the computer models in the active animation.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6. 空間幾何， 7. 偏導數，8. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Basic Vector Analysis, 7.Partial Derivative, 8.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 講述知識性內容包括瞭解設計的意義以及各種幫助人類生活的各種設計領域並討論思想性內容，包括啟發思考及評判的態度以培養正確之設計觀。
description.en: Talking about the beginning of design, observe commodities on the surounding market places, and find how companies provide their commodities for the cansumers "wisely" to atract buyers. Discussion and practice on creativity. Introduce product development techniques, product design processes and how to evaluate good products for human beings.

description.zh: 講述工業設計發展中的各種源流：美術工藝、新藝術、風格派等的設計與藝術革新運動，美國體系的製造法，包浩斯設計教育，歷代設計師及以設計為導向的製造廠商的工作理念與成就，設計風格之演變等。
description.en: Talking about early man and his tools. Traditional handicrafts before the Industrial Revolution, then machines had taken place for manufecturing (Industrial Revolution), Wiliam Morris leaded Art and Craft Movement. Art Nouveau and Art Deco, the Bauhaus, Mass production and mass market, industrial design profession Industrial design up date etc.

description.zh: 以傳授設計原理、平面及立體設計觀念、美的形式原理、平面及立體的構成練習、對各種材料特性的應用經驗以及造形與色彩的研究達到設計感覺的養成並提高計畫性創造能力，是發展實用性及機能性以前之設計訓練的基礎。
description.en: This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of two-dimension and three-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane, volume, and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied.

description.zh: 由對物體寫生的實作過程中，訓練學生對物的觀察能力，並培養對美的感知能力以及充份習得對形體的簡潔速寫技巧、圖示性設計圖之表達能力。
description.en: This course introduces a visual approach to thinking, leaning and communicating for design students. Drawing is a tool to help students solve promblems, create new ideas and assist communication. Through practicing drawing methods, tools and techniques, students learn how to draw more proficiently.

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術。
description.en: Training students to operate some basical equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

description.zh: 探討家具發展之歷程，主要設計風格之嬗變。內容含蓋起源及影響，構造特色，裝飾方法，設計語彙，家具與其相關環境之意義，以及影響風格表現差異之原因分析等主要課題。
description.en: A survey of major periods and stylistic development of furniture from ancient world to the present. The origins and influences, construction techniques, methods of decoration, the vocabulary and significance of furniture and its related environments, an analysis of the reasons for differences in manner of expression are the major themes discussed in the course.

description.zh: 從實作中實驗各種材料的特性並加以活用，線材、板材、塊材的應用訓練，平面與立體的構成練習，美學原理的講解，造形與色彩的研究等以達到設計感覺的養成及創造能力的激發。
description.en: This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of two-dimension and three-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane, volume, and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied.

description.zh: 由對物體寫生的實作過程中，訓練學生對物的觀察能力，並培養對美的感知能力以及充份習得對形體的簡潔速寫技巧、圖示性設計圖之表達能力。
description.en: This course introduces a visual approach to thinking, leaning and communicating for design students. Drawing is a tool to help students solve promblems, create new ideas and assist communication. Through practicing drawing methods, tools and techniques, students learn how to draw more proficiently.

description.zh: 本課程目標期使學生了解各種不同材質之材料應用、機器操作、加工技術與實作經驗以完成美觀、精確之立體模型在設計過程中完整呈現與溝通其設計概念。
description.en: The objectives of the models are following: 1.To assist the student to understand and apply the various materials,tools and practice in 3D model making. 2.To assist the student to studies,imitate,test and present the accurate and concrete of the original concepts in order to thoroughly communicate in design process.

description.zh: 解決問題之突破性觀念與做法以及激發並增強創造力的基本方法，探討創造思考步驟，問題解決行為模式、計劃系統、構想發明技術及團隊創造力方法。
description.en: This course provides knowledge and understanding of creativity techniques in the context of strategic issues and product development in terms of creative thinking process, problem solving model, systems approach, and group dynamics.

description.zh: 此課程對建築所涉及的知識諸如，建築起源與發展；建築的風格、潮流、及文化；建築的類型實例，再從人、建築、環境與生活的角度，作全覽性的介紹。
description.en: I introduce what architects do, some basic signs which are usually used in architecture, and the concept of the space. From the relation of enviroment to buildings, I want to descuss the development from classical architecture to modern architecture. When the students design furniture, they consider the combination of furniture and the space fo the buildings in order to improve the quality of living environment.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷材料、不同成型技法、釉藥知識及燒窯過程。在課堂實習手捏成型、圈條成型、拉坏成型等多種不同成型方法及表面設計應用在陶瓷作品之練習。
description.en: This course aims to develop student's potential in ceramics and pottery making, and to encourage a practical and theoretical understanding of skills and techniques of pottery making process.

description.zh: 講授電腦輔助工程繪圖及電腦輔助設計（包括２Ｄ平面設計及３Ｄ造形模擬）等套裝程式之應用要領、傳輸介面及其週邊設備之規劃，並配合上機實習，以培養靈活之應用技巧。
description.en: This is the lecture of application skill of computer-aided design software 3D Studio Max. It includes 3D form imitation and materials, scene and animation design. It goes with the practice on comprters, in order to train the adept application skill.

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh: 1.	藉其他專業知識的融入訓練學生具備深化建築實質環境的能力，兼顧實質設計手法與內涵。2.	訓練學生具備探討和發展設計議題，培養設計思考和評斷能力，並透過設計報告的撰寫，指導學生獨力發展與組織設計過程的能力。
description.en: With a specific design issue, in this course we explore the students' sensibility to our built environment. Students exercise a complete design process of a real project in two semesters, that they may touch more contexts in design thinking and practice more skills in architectural design.

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

description.zh: 本課主要以實例演練、訓練學生對施工圖樣、施工規範及施工實務之瞭解，並熟練數量計算及單價分析之方法及要點。主要授課內容含蓋：1.講授各項工程施工規範之標準、2.以實例訓練各項工程數量計算及單價分析：a.假設工程 b.安全措施工程 c.土方工程 d.混凝土工程 e.模板工程 f.鋼筋工程 g.磚牆工程 h.粉刷及裝修工程 i.雜項工程。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the working drawings, the performance standards and the affairs of works by drilling actual example. This course makes students to be familiar with not only calculating the quantity but also the essentials and the methods in analyzing the unite price. The lesson's contents include: A.	To teach the standards of every performance standard. B.	To train calculating and analyzing the unite price of every work.1.	Temporary work 2.	Safety measure work 3.	Earthwork4.	Concrete work5.	Mold work6.	Reinforcement work7.	Partition work8.	Plaster, decoration and finish work9.	Miscellaneous work

name.en: Operation and Management of Real Estate

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為提供學生瞭解不動產開發案相關之理論基礎及實務經驗。不動產經營所涉及的領域甚廣，因此課程內容安排著重實務討論及法令解說，藉由案例分享瞭解地方政府落實開發建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策，例如容積獎勵、稅賦減免、都市計畫變更及容積移轉等；另外開發案財務分析導論及比較，讓學生可以系統性的認識各種類型不動產開發案之收益、稅制、規劃限制及風險等，除了增加實務的認識，對於個人理財亦有幫助。課程內容包含1.基礎財務分析、2.不動產相關法令解說、3.不動產產品規劃及銷售實務、4.不動產開發流程及實務、5.產業創新案例分享、6.產業政策與方向及7.實際案例參訪等。
description.en: The course provides both theoretical and pragmatic knowledge in real estate management. Course contents emphasize on practical recitations and codes commentaries. Factors such as area-allowanced incentives, tax reductions, amendments in city planning, and transfer area allowance are addressed in each case study. In addition, financial benefits, tax regulations, design constraints, and risk assessment in development different types are presented in systematic manner thru the course. Course topics include: 1. Fundamental financial analyses. 2. Real estate regulations and codes. 3. Real estate planning and marketing. 4. Procedures in real estate development. 5. Innovations in practice. 6. Real estate policy. 7. Visitation in projects.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在使學生瞭解都市設計歷史與理論是目前設計實務應用的重要基礎，且經由都市設計可以成就良好城鄉環境以適合人類居住與活動。因此本課程內容主要包括(1)都市空間設計理論發展回顧，(2)現代都市設計理論，(3)現代都市設計理論在實務的應用，(4)建築師與規劃師的角色。
description.en: For the aims to develop an appreciation of the history and theory of urban design as an important basis for considering current design practice, and to develop knowledge of design theories and methods by which spatial environments can be ordered, shaped and modified to meet human need, the course consists of (1) urban space design through history, (2) contemporary theory, (3) current theory into practice, (4) the role of the architect and planner.

description.zh: 本課程內容為介紹鋼構造建築物之基本特性，超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，使學生習得解決建築空間與結構型態之實務問題，其主要授課內容為：（1）鋼骨構架之特性，（2）於各種載重下鋼骨構材之行為，（3）鋼構架之變形能力與破壞機構，（4）超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，（5）消能裝置之特性及運用，（6）隔震、制震之現況及展望。
description.en: This course introduced the basic characteristics about steel structure, the structural systems and forms of hi-rise building and special indoor space, in order to provide students to learn the relation between architectural space and structural type, the course consists of (1)the characteristics of steel element,(2)behavior of steel element under variable loads,(3)deformation capacity and collapse mechanism of steel frame,(4)structural system of special indoor space,(5)the application and properties of energy dissipaters or mechanical dampers,(6)the view of base isolators and response control system of structures.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles.   Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 本課程主要是在教導學生了解力學之概念與分析方法，使其具備學習結構學之基礎能力，其主要授課內容包括：1.力學之基本概念及平衡條件、2.構材之斷面性質如形心、重心、面積一次矩、慣性矩及其應用、3.結構構材承受軸向載重、扭力、彎矩之分析及設計應用、4.應力及應變之關係、5.梁之變形，柱之性質以及各種分析理論。
description.en: This course introduced the concept of mechanics and provided the principles of structural analysis, the course consists of(1)	Equations of equilibrium(2)	Frame Section Properties (3)	Shear and moment diagrams (4)	Relationships of stress and strainDeflection of beams and Column characteristics

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:1.	theories in relation to site planning;2.	design sequences of site planning;3.	investigations and analyses of the sites;4.	planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.	environmental impact assessment;6.cases studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，規定學生必須利用寒暑假至建築相關機構實習，至少40天，期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. A forty-day intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en: 1.	Graphic standards for working drawing.2.	Drawing preparation and process.3.	Selected shop drawing

description.zh: 一．建築構造之定意義二．構造之目地與行為三．構造原理與材料及力之傳遞四．一般立體構造及非立體構造五．一般建築構造單元及其六．構造設計實習－材料的利用為主（含設計與施工）七．施工計劃（一）計劃內容（二）工程進度控制（三）營建管理   （Ｃ．Ｍ）八．施工計劃與實習
description.en: This course continued with Construction (I)and (II), Focus on the Building Construction process and practice, Through case studies and field trip, student may have a general idea about management of a building project.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授在建築上之節約能源設計之理念、技術、法規及案例分析等，授課內容包含：1. 建築節約能源導論2. 建築能源對策3. 建築外殼節能設計4. 建築空調節能設計5. 建築採光與照明節能設計6. ENVLOAD之應用7. 綠建築之發展8. 節能案例解說與分析9. 相關法令解說
description.en: This course is focus on the concept technique law and case study about Energy Conservation Design of Architecture .It major content includes :1. Introduction about Architecture's Energy Conservation.2. Impact of Architecture's Energy Conservation.3. Envelope Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.4. Air Conditional Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.5. Lighting and Illumination of Architecture's Energy Conservation.6. Application of Envelope Design.7. Development of Green Architecture.8. Illustration and Analysis of Case study.9. Relative Law and Regulations.

description.zh: 本課程延續景觀建築概論課程，補充人文向度為主的環境和景觀建築範型，使學生瞭解人文涵構和景觀建築構成原理的關聯，包括從景觀設計史，景觀類型，外部空間型態，和景觀元素等角度解析景觀建築中反映的美學觀，社會性因子，使用性和自然觀，以及景觀設計原理。
description.en: The second semester of the serious landscape course focuses on the human dimension in landscape design as a complementary curriculum to the foregoing semester within which natural dimension is the accentuated concern. By introducing environmental and landscape paradigms, the course provides the realization of the relation between humanistic context and composing principles of landscape architecture and the landscape expression in aesthetic, social, natural and utilitarian aspects. The content consists of1.Landscape design history of the west and the east 2.Landscape typology 3.Morphology of outdoor space 4.Landscape design elements

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

description.zh: 一、基本觀念：1.生活、空間與建築。2.建築類型與設計的關係。二、各種建築類型分析：1.商業設施2.辦公大樓3.飯店、旅館4.學校建築5.圖書館。
description.en: 1.The basic conception: a. Living, Space and Architecture. b. The relation between building and design. 2.The analysis of the building types: a. Commercial facility. b. Office building. c. Hotel. d. School building. E. Library.

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生了解各結構系統的架構及概念，與其受地震力、風力之行為。1.作用於建築物之荷重、2.結構材料性質與結構需求、3.基本應力、4.受張及受壓結構、5.桁架結構、6.樑及構架系統、7.格子樑、平版及摺板系統、8.薄膜結構、9.薄殼結構
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the concepts and behaviors of each kind of structural systems. 1.Loads on Structures, 2.Structural Materials and Structural Requirements, 3.Fundamental Stress, 4.Tension and Compression Structures, 5.Truss Systems, 6.Beam and Rigid Frames, 7.Grid, Slab and Folded-Plate, 8.Membrane Structures, 9.Thin Shells

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.
