description.en: Environmental Planning and Management aims to study the relationship between environmental problems and social, economics and ecology. The theory and technology of planning are also described. The environmental impact assessment is a major method for the approching of balance between economical development and environmental protection, therefore it is stressed to state it's contents and assessment methods. Further the National planning and City planning in the area of environmental espects are also described in the course. It intends to let the students realize how to have a sustainable development under the policy of environmental protection.

description.zh: 本課程以講授環境工程所涉及之應用性化學為主，包括基礎普化的反應平衡化學，物理化學，有機化學，微生物化學，分析化學，以及實用性的水處理化學，廢棄物處理化學，空氣污染化學，與土壤污染化學。
description.en: "Chemistry for Environmental Engineering"is a course to introduce the comprehensive chemistry applied to general environmental engineering.The content of course consists of reaction equilibrican chemistry,physical chemistry,crganic chemistry,biochemistry,ananlysis chemistry,and the special chemistry topics on sewerage and solid waste treatments.

description.zh: 給水系統的設計旨在充分供應計劃人口與計劃年限之計劃用水量，主要討論單元有：取水工程、輸水工程（動力管及壓力管之設計）、淨水工程（沈澱、混凝膠凝、過濾及消毒等）、配水工程（面積法、累積曲線法及經驗法等配水池設計方法、及各種配水管網之型式設計）等四大單元之設計，經由充份的習題演算，使學者熟悉給水系統設計方法。
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

name.en: Operation and Maintenance of Water Plant

description.zh: 水處理廠操作與維護課程包括給水工程及污水工程設施之操作與維護,本課程為傳統衛生工程設施最主要之部份,內容涵蓋物理單元化學單元以及生物單元之操作維護,主要之設施包括前處理,混凝,沈澱,過濾,消毒,活性污泥,旋轉生物盤,接觸曝氣法以及污泥處理,處置單元之操作維護.
description.en: Water supply Engineering includes the system from water sources, intake, conveyor, purification and distribution. Water source will discuss about the intakes and resource conservation. Conveyor will have topics about layout, pumping and piping. Water treatment flow sheet is most important part in this course and the special treatment about odor problem is also studied.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

description.zh: A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流
description.en: (A)Dynamics of a particles:(1)Kinematics of a particles:rectilinear coordinates, tangential and normal coordinates,polar coordinates.(2)Kinetics of a particles:force and acceleration, work and energy,impulse and momentum.(B)Dynamics of a rigid bodies (1)Kinematics of rigid bodies:translation and rotation,relative motion,instaneous zero velocity center.(2)Kinetics of rigid bodies:force and acceleration, work and energy, impulse and momentum.

description.zh: 使學習者瞭解土壤與岩石之性質對隧道設計、開挖之相互關係。課程內容包括隧道工程介紹、隧道之荷重及應力分佈、地質調查、支撐及襯砌設計、各類隧道施工之方法及計測儀器之說明。
1.概論 2.建築載重及結構反應 3.空間整合與結構系統 4.建築常用之結構系統,含形態成用系統,向量作用系統,面作用系統及體積作用等5.垂直結構系統 6.水平結構系統 7.高樓結構系統 8.基礎結構系統 9.結構系統與建造
description.en: 1.Course introduction 2.Structural loading and structural behaviors 3.Space integration and structural system 4.Popular structural systems 5.Vertical structural system 6.Horizontal structural system 7.High rise building structural system 8.Foundation structual system 9.Structural system and construction

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

name.zh: 結構隔減震及耐震設計
name.en: Seismic Isolation and Earthquake Resistant Design

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹結構如何提高結構物承受地震力之能力，並探討各國有關結構隔減震及耐震設計規範，使同學了解其設計精神所在，更進一步訓練同學建立對於各種結構使用何種設計的判斷能力及設計技術。
本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（一）

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug controlled release. Orthopaedic deveics, artificial joints, biochips, and modifications of materials surfaces are covered in the category of medical devices. Artificial cartilage, skin, liver al. etc. are introduced in the artificial organ field. In tissue engineering, scaffold materials, biodegradable materials and bio-reactor design are discussed. Polymeric membranes and targeting drug delivery are focused when the drug controlled release are discussed.

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 由環境保護的觀點來了解化學工業及其他產業之污染源，並且教授資源回收、減廢技術、進而設計清潔生產製程，以達到廢棄物資源化與管理的最終目
description.en: This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and other industries. And the course will cover the techniques for waste recycle and reduction. Furthermore, the final goal is to design a cleaner technology process for achieving the waste minimization and waste management.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子奈米複合材料之基本原理、製備加工、結構形態與其特殊物理及化學性質，並討論其應用及發展趨勢。
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles, synthesis approaches, processing techniques, morphology, characterization, and the unique chemical and physical aspects associated with polymer based nanocomposite materials. It will also describe the applications and the development of high performance materials as well as future directions for research in the field.

description.zh: 介紹工業觸媒在化學工業上所扮演的重要角色與有關吸附與催化之理論基礎，使學生瞭解工業觸媒的各種型態、物性、化性、鑑定方法、基本製造方法、性能評估及動力測試等內容在工業上實際應用例包括氫化、氧化、烷基化、裂解、重組、分餾、脫硫工程、汽車廢氣之控制以及藥物之合成。
description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

name.zh: 光電元件製造技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將介紹光電材料的種類與基本特性，包括材料的光電性質、磁性性質及導電與介電性質等的基本物理與化學概念，並探討其相關應用與目前發展狀況，以了解各種光電材料的製程、特性與原理。
description.en: The course introduces the categories of optoelectronic devices and their fundamental properties, including the optical, magnetic and electric as well as dielectric properties. Furthermore, the usage of such devices and their future applications will be discussed. The manufacturing technology of these optoelectronic devices will be investigated along with their processing units as well as basic mechanisms.

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 0. 簡介 第一部份：源編碼 1. 源編碼定理與熵 2. 非失真壓縮：runlength, Huffman, arithmetic, Lempel-Ziv, * 3. 碼率-失真定理 4. 失真壓縮：量化、預測技術、轉換與次頻帶編碼、MPEG 第二部分：通道編碼 5. 通道編碼定理與通訊容量 6. 有限場簡介7. 區塊碼：CRC, Hamming, Golay, BCH, Reed-Solomon, * 8. 迴旋碼 9. 編碼調變）
description.en: 0. Introduction Part I. Source Coding 1. Source Coding Theorem and Entropy 2. Lossless Compression: runlength, Huffman, arithmetic, Lempel-Ziv, * 3. Rate-Distortion Theorem 4. Lossy Compression: quantization, predictive techniques, transform and subband coding, MPEG Part II. Channel Coding 5. Channel Coding Theorem and Capacity 6. Introduction to Finite Fields 7. Block Codes: CRC, Hamming, Golay, BCH, Reed-Solomon, * 8. Convolutional Codes 9. Coded Modulation

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。
description.en: 1.History and paradigm of programming languages 2.Design principles of programming languages 3.Syntex and semantics 4.Data types 5.Control structures 6. Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉Http運作原理、動態網頁製作、及資料庫系統設計等相關技術，以奠定開發網際網路應用系統所需之學理與實務基礎。課程內容包括：1. Visual Studio .Net 開發環境簡介 2. Html網頁設計 3. ActiveX網頁設計 4. VB Script程式設計 5. http Server/CGI工作原理 6. Active Server Page (ASP) 動態網頁設計 7. 資料庫系統開發環境簡介 8. Web資料庫應用系統設計 9. 進階資料庫應用設計 10. 網站管理介面設計 11. 行動網際網路應用系統設計 12. 期末專題設計
description.en: To familiarize the students with the Internet related technologies and web application systems design. Topics include: 1. Visual Studio .Net 2. HTML Page Design 3. ActiveX Page Design 4. VBScript Programming 5. CGI Programming 6. Active Server Page Design 7. Database System Concept 8. Web Database Application System Design 9. Advanced Database Application System 10. Web Administration System Design 11. Mobile Web System Design 12. Term Project

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉J2EE (Java 2 Enterprise Edition)架構下，開發企業級網際網路應用系統所需之各項整合技術，包括：1. J2EE平台架構 2. J2EE系統開發環境 3. Java物件技術 4. JavaBeans元件設計 5. JDBC資料庫應用 6. JSP網頁技術 7. Servlet元件技術 8. MVC架構設計 9. JMS訊息服務 10. EJB元件設計 11. Web Services整合技術 12. JAAS安全技術 13. J2ME行動通信技術
description.en: To familiarize the student with the J2EE, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, technologies on enterprise systems integration design. Topics include: 1. J2EE architecture. 2. J2EEdevelopment environments 3. Java OO technologies 4. JavaBeans 5. JDBC 6. Java Server Page 7. Servlet 8. MVC design pattern 9. Java Messaging System 10. Enterprise Java Beans 11. Web Services 12. Java Authentication and Authorization Service 13. Java 2 Micro Edition

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.zh: 介紹家具產銷體系從原始概念、產品發展以迄賣到最後消費者手中所涉及之種種。課程內容包括行銷研究、產品開發、標價計畫、配銷、廣告促銷以及行銷計畫等。
description.en: An introduction to furniture production and marketing systems. Emphasis is on the role of marketing in a managerial context. Areas studied include: Product development, marketing research and information systems, pricing, adverising, promotion, distribution and inventory management.

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 1. 通訊系統比較2. 光纖通訊的優點3. 光纖4. 光發射器及光源5. 檢光器及接收器6. 光纖系統設計7. 先進光波系統8. 光放大器9. 光纖通訊實習(3~5個實驗)
description.en: 1. Comparison between communication systems2. Optical fibers3. Optical sources and transmitters4. Optical detectors and receivers 5. System design 6. Coherent lightwave systems7. Optical amplifiers8. Laboratory work: 3-5 experiments

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: (1)信號取樣與信號重整 (2)分時多工脈幅調變之傳送與接收(3)脈碼調變之傳送與接收系統 (4)Delta調變 (5)適應性Delta調變 (6)數位數據編碼 (7)振幅移鍵數位調變 (8)頻率移鍵數位調變 (9)相移鍵數位調變 (10)正交相移數位調變 (11)雙旁波AM的產生 (12)雙旁波AM的接收 (13)FM電波。
description.en: course title : communication lab.description : this course is to let students understand the communication techniques through the experiments

description.zh: 中文簡介、單晶體與雙晶體放大器、藕合電路、差動放大器、電晶體電流源、主動元件與負載、匹配與偏壓電路、操作放大器、頻率響應、回授電路穩定度、非線性類比電路、電路雜訊、電阻佈局、電容佈局、二極體佈局、雙極性與場效電晶體佈局等。
description.en: English Description General Induction , Single-Transistor and Two-Transistor Ampligier，Coupled Circuit and Differential Amplifiers，Transister Current Sources and Active Loads，Matching and Biasing Circuits，Operational Ampligiers，Frequency response of Ics，Frequency Response and Stability of Feedback Amplifiers，Nonlinear Analog Circuits，Noise in IC Components and Circuit System，Resistor layout，Capacitor layout，Diode layout，Bipolar Transistor layout，CMOS Transistor layout。

description.zh: 本課程討論液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括1.液晶之來由及其分類2.液晶之電場與磁場效應3.液晶之光學性質4.液晶顯示器（STN LCD,TFT LCD）及其他應用5.液向型液晶及其在生物體與日常生活體品之應用6.高分子液晶與高強度纖維
description.en: The course is an introduction to Liquid Crystal Materials. Including 1.What are Liquid Crystal? 2.The story of Liquid Crystal；3.Electric and Magnetic Field Effects；4.Light and Nematic Liquid Crystal；5. Liquid Crystal Displays(STN-LCD, TFT-LCD) and other applications；6.Lyotropic Liquid Crystal；7.Polymer Liquid Crystals.

description.zh: 配合高分子課程的講授，教導學生親自配製試葯、操作儀器﹐進行高分子聚合實驗、檢驗分析與結果討論﹐訓練學生的實驗室合成技巧及基本的高分子材料鑑定分析儀器之技術﹐包括光譜分析 (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), 分子量量測(GPC), 熱分析(DSC, TGA)等之分析技術
description.en: Experimental techniques include: the Lab work of polymer synthesis , the charterization of polymer materials and the operation of the related instruments, including spectrum analysis (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), the measurement of molecular weight (GPC), thermal analysis (DSC, TGA) etc.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer in Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配。
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers, Design of sensing element, Signal Conditioning Circuit Design, Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor, Fabrication of sensor, Selection and Application of the sensors.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。視覺檢測的基本原理、視覺系統原理各元件之作用原理、規格、限制等、影像處理技術（包括影像轉換、影像復原、影像強化、影像分割）、非接觸性尺寸量測、模式辨認（自動邊境偵測：表面積、孔數、週長及重心、方向特徵等）、影像壓縮與傳送、電腦的影像傳送、個案研究。
description.en: Basic Principle of Vision Inspection, Hardware Components of Vision System, Image Processing (Image Transform, Image Restoration, Image Enhancement, Image Segmentation), Non-Contact Dimension Measurement, Pattern Recognition (Automatic Edge Detection: Surface Area, Number of Holes, Perimeter, Centroid, Directional characteristic etc.) Image Compression and Transmission, and Case Study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分微積分與最佳化之關係及其在工程最佳化上之應用、端點條件、不連續最佳化程序、無限制及有限制條件最佳化問題、直接法及實際最佳化設計應用等。
description.en: Introduction of Variational Calculus and its Application in the Engineering Optimal Design, Constrained/Unconstrained Optimal Design Problems, Discrete Optimal Control and Mathematical Programming, Practical Examples of Optimum Design.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 限碩士班甲組學生修讀

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technology and application on the power engineering via seminar. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.zh: 研究討論-電力電子工程

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of control engineering.  Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.  Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習通訊工程領域之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習計算機工程領域之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of  computer engineering.  Renowned researchers and scholars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.  Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 中文課程概述：類比IC簡介、運算放大器設計與補償、電流鏡與高性能運算放大器、比較器、取樣與閂鎖電路、電壓參考與傳輸線電路、切換電容電路、數位與類比轉換電路、超取樣交換器、濾波器與傳輸器、鎖相迴路等。預修課程 ：電子學
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Opamp Design and Compensation，Advanced Current Mirrors and OPamps，Comparators，Sample and Hold Circuits， Voltage References and Translinear Circuits，Transforms and Filters，Switch-capacitor circuits (1)，Switch-capacitor circuits (2) ，D/A and A/D Converters，Nyquist-rate D/A Converters，Nyquist-rate A/D Converters，Oversampling Converters，Filters and Transconductors，Phase-locked Loops (PLL) (1) ，Phase-locked Loops (PLL) (2)。

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

name.en: An Introduction to Chemical Process Machinery

description.zh: 本課程教學目的在於期望同學對化工機械之基本原理、技術與應用有所認知。其內容包含機械原理、固體乾縮機械、篩選及分級設備、輸送和升降設備、流體機械、蒸發器、結晶機械、乾燥機械、抽真空裝置、熱交換器、自動控制機構。
description.en: The object of this course is to make students understand the theory, technology and application of chemical process machinery. The contents of text are mechanism of machinery, devices for the dry reduction in size of solid materials, screening and grading equipments, conveying and elevating equipments, fluid machinery, evaporators, crystallizers, driers, vacuum producing devices, heat exchangers, and automatic control mechanics.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 當代輔導主要理論、技職教育學生特質、生涯發展與規劃、職業輔導相關問題研討。
description.en: The contents include The Theories of Contemporary Counseling, Characters of Vocational Education Students, Career Planning and Development. Topics will cover a wide range of profession counseling, Job-placement, and student services.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的製程及功能，並探討材料的性質與材料組成原子的電子組態、原子間之化學鍵結、及晶體結構間的關係。本課程涵蓋了下列內容：1.原子的電子組態及原子間之化學鍵結，2.晶體結構，3.晶體缺陷與固體中的擴散，4.相圖與相變化，5.金屬材料及工程合金，6.陶瓷材料的結構、性質、製程與應用，7.高分子材料的結構、性質、應用與加工，8.複合材料，9.材料之機械性質，10.材料之電性質，11.材料之熱性質，12.材料之磁性質，13.材料之光學性質，14.材料的腐蝕與蛻化，15.半導體材料、生醫材料、先進材料、智慧型材料及奈米科技，16.材料與環境的相互影響，17.材料的選擇與設計考量。
description.en: This course introduces the fabrication and performance of various materials as well as the relationships that exist between the chemical bonding, structures and properties of materials.It covers the following topics: Atomic Structures and Interatomic Bonding; Structure of Crystalline Solids; Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids; Phase Diagrams and Phase Transformations; Applications and Processing of Metal and Alloys; Structures, Properties, Applications and Processing of Ceramics; Structures, Characteristics, Applications and Processing of Polymers; Composites; Mechanical Properties of Materials; Electrical Properties of Materials; Thermal Properties of Materials; Magnetic Properties of Materials; Optical Properties of Materials; Corrosion and Degradation of Materials; Semiconductors, Biomaterials, Advanced Materials, Smart Materials and Nanotechnology; Environmental Issues in Materials Science and Engineering; Materials Selection and Design Considerations.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。基本熱傳理論、郎肯循環：蒸汽發生設備、渦輪機、冷凝器、泵及風扇、氣輪機及複合循環；核能原理、PWR、BWR、GCR、LMFBR；再生能源：地熱、太陽能、風力、海洋能源；能源之儲存；環境污染之防治。
description.en: Principles of Heat Transfer, Rankine Cycle: Steam Generators, Turbines Condensers, Pumps and Fans, Gas-Turbine and Combined Cycles, Principles of Nuclear Energy, Nuclear Power Plants: PWR, BWR, GCR, LMFBR, Renewable Energy Resources: Geothermal Energy, Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Energy from the Oceans, Energy Storage, Environmental Aspects of Power Generation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
description.en: Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.

description.zh: 直流馬達單向換流器相位控制實習,直流馬達三向換流器相位控制實習,感應馬達交流電壓控制實習,感應馬達變頻驅動控制實習,伺服馬達之微算機化控制(小專題方式)。
description.en: 1.phase control of single phase converter of DC motor.2.phase control of three phase converter of DC motor.3.voltage control of induction motor.4.frequency variable drivers of induction motor.5.microcomputer control of servo motor.(project)

description.zh: 直流馬達單向換流器相位控制實習,直流馬達三向換流器相位控制實習,感應馬達交流電壓控制實習,感應馬達變頻驅動控制實習,伺服馬達之微算機化控制(小專題方式)。
description.en: 1.phase control of single phase converter of DC motor.2.phase control of three phase converter of DC motor.3.voltage control of induction motor.4.frequency variable drivers of induction motor.5.microcomputer control of servo motor.(project)

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 環境工程主要介紹地球的生態、水污染、空氣污染及所具有的能源與原料。課程內容包括生態原理、生態系統、食物生產、水資源、水污染介紹、水處理、空氣污染介紹、空氣污染氣象、空氣污染防治技術、能源種類、電力、核能、未來的新能源、礦物資源。
description.en: This class is designed to have students understand the air,water and solid contamination in our globe system.  Various environmental protection and pollution control techniques are also introduced which include water, air and solid pollution control methods in various industries that are closely related to material and mineral industries.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源、致動器、控制元件及迴路、傳送、配管、維護與安全、液氣壓比例與伺服控制、自動控制理論應用於液氣壓工程。
description.en: Introduction to Pneumatic Engineering, Characteristic of Compressible Gas, Air Conditioning & Control, Pneumatic Parts & Control Circuit, Application of Sequence Controller on Pneumatic Control, Introduction to Hydraulic Engineering, Characteristic & Conditioning of Hydraulic Fluid, Hydraulic Theory, Power Unit, Actuator, Control Parts & safety,Hydraulic & Pneumatic Proportional & Servo Control, and Application of Automatic Control to Hydraulic Engineering.

description.zh: 以金屬材料之基本觀念為基礎，更進一步探討銅，鋁，鎂，鎳等合金之特性、用途及其熱處理，並以近年來頗受注目的高強度鋁合金之特性，從組織結構加以探討。課程內容有:1.高強度鋁及鋁合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。2.特殊及耐蝕銅及銅合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。3.錫，鉛，鋅及其合金之種類，特性、用途探討。4.耐蝕，高強度鎳及鎳合金之種類，特性、用途探討。5.高強度，耐氧化性鈦及鈦合金之種類，特性、用途之探討。6.高科技用貴金屬之種類，特性、用途之探討。
description.en: Using the basic concept of metal material as foundation to further discuss thecharacteristics, usage and heat treatment of the alloy of Cu, Al, Mg,Ni, it alsodiscusses the eye-catching high strength property of aluminum alloy at the recentyears, and study it from the viewpoint of tissue structure. The course contentincludes the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of highstrength aluminum and aluminum alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 2.The specification, usage and property of special copper, anti-corrosion copper andcopper alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 3.The specification, usage andproperty study of Sn, Pb, Zn and their alloy. 4.The specification, usage and propertystudy of anti-corrosion, high strength nickle and nickle alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property study of high strength, oxidation resistant titanium and titaniumalloy.6.The specification, usage and property study of high-tech noble metal.

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 介紹電子陶瓷之原理及應用 訓練學生對電子陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: introduction to electronic ceramics In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

description.zh: 環境地質的調查與研究、以了解自然資源之使用與未來的展望。內容包括：水、土壤、礦產資源、能源開發、認識地質作用對人類生存環境的影響、認識自然災害，瞭解人為破壞引起的災害，地質環境改變，人類衛生環境的影響，及各種廢料處理。
description.en: This course introduce how water、soil、mineral and rock resources、energy exploit and geology processes influence human activities, recognize the geology hazards,the geologic aspects of pollution and waste-disposal problems, and several other topics.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程的內容包括：HTML語法、ASP程式語言、網頁與資料庫連結、XML語法簡介、JSP語法簡介、製造業應用展示說明。
description.en: Brief: This course covers different programming languages and technologies used to construct Web Based Systems, such as HTML, ASP, Connection to Database Systems, XML, JSP, etc. Some examples applied to industries are also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程在討論陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metals and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 一、合成方法--固相、溶液、氣相反應法二、成核與晶體成長機構與速率三、單晶合成-矽晶、石英及鑽石四、粉末合成-鈦酸鋇系、氧化鐵系、氧化鋯、氧化鋁、氧化鋅之合成五、薄膜技術簡介
description.en: 一、Method - solid liquid and vapor state reaction二、Mechanism and rate of neucleation and crystal growth三、Single crystal- silicon silica and diamond四、Powders- Barium titanite Ferrites Zirconia Alumina Zinc oxide五、Introduction to thin film techniques

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解                                         不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Introduction the methods of engineering cost calculate.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究(一)

description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 應用習慣領域(Habitual Domain)理論發展評量企業、政府、學校國家競爭力的方法。引用的技術有Habitual Domain ball、Probabilistic reasoning、Global optimization。(全域最佳化演算法設計、機率推理系統設計、有限制式機率推理系統設計、習慣領域評量、決策分析應用偏好球理論、資料包絡分析、群組評量應用)
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of group evaluation techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include Habitual Domain ball、Probabilistic reasoning、Global optimization、Design of Global Optimization Algorithms、Design of Probabilistic Reasoning Systems、Constrained Probabilistic Reasoning by Global Optimization Techniques、Measuring Habitual Domain by a HD-Ball、Decision Making by Preference Ball、DEA Analysis by Utilizing a Preference Ball & DEA Analysis for World Class Industries、Evaluation of National Competitiveness。

description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 一、 本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、 講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、 講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1. This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2. The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 3. The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹多媒體設計系統其中包括系統的操作技巧、運動與動畫製作技巧、互動與交談設計、軟體除錯與包裝、多媒體教材製作等相關技術。
description.en: This module is concerned with Multimedia Authoring Scripting and the use of Multimedia Development Tools and applying them in cross-platform multimedia production.  This course provides the student with a knowledge of the various concepts and techniques used in multimedia systems

description.zh: (1)奈米科技的歷史與發展 (2)奈米材料(結構)的基本概念與物理性質 (3)奈米材料(結構)的製作與檢測 (4)奈米材料及元件的光電特性 (5)奈米材料的應用
description.en: (1)History and development of nanoscience and technology (2)Elementary concepts and physical properties of nanomaterials (3)Synthesis and characterization methods for nanomaterials and structures (4)Optoelectronics for nanoscale materials and devices (5)Applications of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is aimed directly at the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature. And to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will design this course under deliberating the differences of each departments to emphasize or to omit some contents. The course is designed for 6 credits for two semesters; 3 credits for each semester,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程在於教導學生認識工業上最主要的均相催化反應，介紹過渡金屬催化於有機合成及高分子合成之應用並討論其反應機構。
description.en: The aim of this course is to educate students to understand the major industrial processes for homogeneous catalysis.  The use of transition metal complexes for organic synthesis and Marco-molecular synthesis is introduced.  For each reaction, the mechanism is discussed.

description.en: Discussed the basic concept and mathematical of reliability engineering associated with comprehensive methodolgy of electronic system reliability design practices. These topics are grouped into four parts as follow :1.Devoted to the basic theory and mathematical of reliability   engineering. 2.Deal with electronic system reliability design practices :   Circuit simplification , parts selection and application ,   Hi-Rel parts screening , Derating , Transients suppression   and protection circuits , EMC design , Thermal and   vibration design , and Redundancy. 3.Dosvusses the reliability analysis methods : Reliability   modeling and prediction , Failure mode、effects and   criticality analysis (FMECA) , and Fault tree analysis   (FTA). 4.Dedicated to reliability testing : Environmental streess   screening (ESS) , Reliability growth test , Reliability   qualification test , and Accelerated life test.

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。

It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

description.zh: 都市規劃之議題由土地使用機能滿足、都市景觀優美，進而要求都市的生態永續性；然而更進一步的都市規劃目標更在確保都市居民的健康議題。本課程在研討都市規劃技術上如何考量諸如：對市民呼吸道健康之影響鉅大的都市落塵在社區及校園狀況、都市供電系統產生非游離輻射分佈探討、都市噪音在社區分佈影響、社區室內外有害微生物分佈影響分析等，都市空間規劃上的健康問題探討及改善。
description.en: The main issue of urban planning of land use has shifted in the past decades to landscaping issues and then to urban sustainability. Jet recently the health issues in urban planning becomes more important after the incidents of pollution and epidemic.The purpose of this seminar is, how could health issues and techniques be considered and applied in practical urban planning, such as: PM10 aerosol distribution in communities and school districts, magnetic fields caused by power facilities, the noise effect on urban areas, the effect of microorganism in communities indoors and outdoors etc.

Sys. 3.Hydro-engine utilization tech. 4.Tech.of M.H.D. power generation. 5.Evaluation Tech for Non-electric Power Air Cond. Sys. 6.Optimize Design of Non -electric Power Air Cond. Sys.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式， Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

description.zh: 由於世界各國對自來水水質標準逐漸提高，因此，自來水高級處理已變成目前國際上飲用水研究之主要趨勢。此外在台灣，由於河川受污水下水道普及率低及工業污染之影響下，原水水質長久不佳。傳統處理程序已無法因應消費者之需求，高雄水質不佳即是最好例子。因此，本課程之重點嘉集中高級自來水之處理程序，如薄膜逆滲透、超過濾、為過濾、臭氧等高級氧化程序與有機物吸附等處理程序。
description.en: Because of the tightened regulation enacted by many countries, advanced drinking water treatment technology has been the research focus all around the world. In addition, in Taiwan, water resource, including surface and ground water, are seriously polluted due to industrial discharge and low sewerage system connection ratio. Traditional treatment processes, such as coagulation, sedimentation, filtration, are not enough for water purification for these deterioraated raw water gualities. Therefoore, this class will offer the opportunity to improve the knowledge for advanced drinking water treatment technology, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ozone disinfection, GAC adsorption, and me.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 環境污染防治法規為現階段執行環境污染預防與環境管理之重要策略之一,本課程內容包括水污染防治,空氣污染防治,固體廢棄物,毒性物質管理,噪音管制以及環境影響評估等相關法規,授課涵蓋法規制定背景,重要管制規定,處理及處置規範以及相關之罰則.
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the laws and regulations of environmental pollution control.

description.zh: 隨著工業化的進展,土壤污染日益嚴重,由早期之鎘米事件,引起世人對於土壤污染之重視,本課程分別就土壤污染之定義,土壤污染之種類,土壤污染之來源,土壤污染之影響,土壤污染之危害介紹,以使受業者能有一全盤之了解.
description.en: The soil pollution in Taiwan are more and more serious by industrial development.From earlly Cd-rice event,people are focus to the soil pollution,This topic is going to edaling about the definition of soil pollution,the kinds of soil pollution,the sources of soil pollution,the effective of soil pollution,and the hazard of soil pollution.

description.zh: 本課程以實務應用為主，使學生在熟悉基本焚化原理後，利用國內現有中、小型爐為例，介紹焚化系統之整體規劃與設計方法，包括系統選擇評估，爐型與規格之設計，後處理評選等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to promote the knowledge of incineration system for students. This course focuses on concept and basic principle with the following items: 1.Introduction.2.Basic theory of combustion.3.Performance of incinerator.4.Basic design.5.Preliminary planning.6.Air pollution control devices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.晶體結構與晶體缺陷 2.光電材料的種類 3.材料的光電特性 4.發光元件 5.檢光元件 6.各種光耦合器
description.en: 1.Crystal structures and defects 2.Optoelectronic aterials3.Optoelectronic 4.Light-emitting devices 5.Properties of materials 6.Optical couplers

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
description.en: This course is designated to enhance students' English ability so that they can perform well in any future programme of study. The course consists of two main elements: 1. EFL listening, speaking, reading, and writing, 2. self study skills.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 語言是人類情感相互溝通的橋樑，促進人際關係的和諧，而如何把自己的想法、看法、非常輕鬆而正確的說出來，卻不是一件簡單的事。要想說的中肯、說得技巧，就必須經過一番學習與研究。這就牽涉到：與意學、語言學以及倫理學、理則學與表演術，讓別人聽了樂於接納。因此必須注意說話的內容、音調和儀態三方面的基本訓練，更更要注意時間、空間、對象，而有所不同。還要傾聽別人說話的美德。總之，會說不是胡說、亂說、愛說與白說，也就是能放能收、恰到好處。
description.en: Being the bridge of human communication,language improves personal relationship. But how to express oneself comfortably is not that simple. It needs practice and skill if one wants to speak to the point. This 「practice」involves semantics、linguistics、ethics、logic and performance. Therefore, the content、tone and deportment are all essential  elements to a successful speech. When to speak、where to speak and to whom to speak are various components of one's talk. To listen is more important than to speak.

name.en: Medical Trend in the New Era

description.zh: 本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.新醫療關係與諮詢、2.如何與醫師對話、3.高關注照護醫療倫理、4.掌握生命力、5.新人類通病、6.領袖特質發展之醫療觀、7.善用醫療資源網路、8.未來基因新療法、9.由健保財務危機看新發展潮流、10.急症新趨勢與預防、11.如何自我建診、12.親子醫療新方向、13.健康全方位人格發展新趨勢-4Q學習、14.生命奇蹟-心肺復甦術理論與演練、15.醫療市場與策略之新趨勢。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講、情境實習演練。
description.en: This course aims to acquaint students with the new trend of medical treatment. From a medical perspective, students will be furnished with new ideas about health.  With practical training and application, students will have a better understanding of life values.The contents of this course include: (1) New perspective on medical relations and consultation (2) How to talk to doctors  (3) Medical Ethics on intensive care (4) The mastering of your life-force (5) The common failing of the new generation (6) A medical observation on leadership qualities (7) How to make use of the internet resources (9) Financial crisis caused by health insurance and the future development (10) The new idea about emergency cases and their prevention (11) Self-exam on health (12) New medical theory on parent-child treatment (13) 4Q-multi-dimensional development of personality (14) Miracles-the theory and practice of CPR (15) New trend on the medical market and strategy.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion, spe

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生明瞭中國及西洋人生哲學的歷史發展，並介紹人生哲學的內在涵義，分別探究人的意義、特性、人性論、真善美聖等問題；兼及人生哲學的當代意義：包括各種人生觀、生命的尊嚴、愛與婚姻及修養等探究。使知、情、意能融為一體，藉以確立個人理性的生命追尋目標。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to enable students to realize historical development in Chinese and Western philosophy of life by introducing the inner connotation of philosophy of life and studying the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life, humanism, virtue, good and beauty, etc..  Furthermore, this course introduces the meanings of philosophy of life in relation to the contemporary life, such as various kinds of philosophy of life, dignity of life, love and marriage, moral cultivation. It aims to integrate knowledge, passion and intention, for setting up the goal that personal rational life should pursue.

description.zh: 本課程係初級日文(一)、(二)的延續，再利用半年一學期的時間，繼續增強學生對日語的興趣，加強學生對日語的簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識日本及日語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。授課內容：日常生活之對話、童謠、歌曲及民俗文化等。
description.en: This is a continue course of Primary Japanese(I) and (Ⅱ). Students are expected to keep their interests in study Japanese language, further improve their communication skills, better understand Japanese culture, and become globalization. The course contains: daily conversation, folk songs, music and traditional culture of Japan.

description.zh: 唐代為中國文學極盛之時代，而其光彩足以越邁古今者，莫若詩歌。唐詩有古體、近體之分，近體詩分五言律、七言律、五言絕、七言絕四種。本課程之教授以近體詩為主。唐近體詩之作者極多，本課程之教授以最有名之詩人與詩篇為主。除強調多讀多背之外，尚教以吟唱練習，教授內容有宜蘭酒令、天籟調、福建調，與江西調。
description.en: Tang Dynasty marks the climax of the Chinese literature.  Of all the literary genres, the achievements of Tang poetry, in particular, are superior to that of any other period. Tang poetry has two different styles: archaic and contemporary.  The contemporary style includes five-word lu, seven-word lu, five-word chueh, seven-word chueh, the best of which are the foci of this course.  In addition to reading and memorization, the practice of poem-singing is emphasized.  The contents include: Yi-lan chiu-lin, Tien-lai Tiao, Fu-kien Tiao, and Kiang-si Tiao.

name.en: The Social and Cutural Characters in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是涵括台灣社會與台灣文化兩大部份，台灣社會部份可分為早期台灣原住民社會，十七世紀以後漢人社會的建立，十九世紀從移民社會到定居社會，近代工商業社會的建立等幾部份；文化方面則以原住民文化，漢人文化及近代文化為教授重點，希望在一學期的課程中使學生對台灣的社會與文化有一概括性的了解。
description.en: This course primarily includes two major sections: Taiwan's society and Taiwan's culture.  Taiwan's society is made up of early aboriginal society, Han immigrant society after 17th century, the society of settlement in 19th century and the establishment of industrial/commercial society after 1930.  Taiwan's culture focuses on aboriginal culture, Han culture, and contemporary culture.  This one-semester course provides students with the basic knowledge about the Taiwan's society and culture in the hope that the students would have a comprehensive understanding of the culture and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

Furthermore, this course introduces the meanings of philosophy of life in relation to the contemporary life, such as various kinds of philosophy of life, dignity of life, love and marriage, moral cultivation. It aims to integrate knowledge, passion and intention, for setting up the goal that personal rational life should pursue.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

name.en: An Introduction to Chinese Cultural and Historical Relics

description.zh: 我國數千年之歷史文明，流傳下無數具有歷史、藝術及科學價值的文物，宮廷民間的收藏、考古文物的出土，即是明證。因此本課程旨在讓現代人認識、珍惜這項人類共有之文化遺產。課程採取數位教師合開方式，內容有：一、 陶瓷器：介紹陶瓷器之製作、顏色、紋飾、造型。二、 玉器：介紹玉器之玉材、雕工、沁色、形制、紋飾、用途。三、 青銅器：介紹青銅器之製作、類別、紋飾、銘文、禮器文化意涵。 四、 考古文物：介紹當代重大考古發現，呈現一代一地出土文物之全貌。
description.en: With thousands of years of history, an immense supply of historical and cultural relics, which are bestowed with historical, artistic and scientific significance, have been passed down to us. These relics are found in emperors' palaces, in private houses or by way of archeological discovery. The course is designed to help modern people understand and cherish the cultural heritage, which is supposed to be shared by all the human beings. The course is jointly directed by more than a few instructors. Some of the topics include:1. Ceramics: How are ceramics wares made? What do the colors, decorations and appearance mean?2.	Jade: What are the original materials to make jade wares? How are jade wares carved? What do the colors, decorations, forms mean? To what purpose are the jade wares made?3.	Bronze Wares: How are the bronze wares made? What categories are there in the bronze wares? What do the carvings and engravings in the service utilities mean?4. Archaic Relics: What are some of the gr

description.zh: 小本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.人類胚胎幹細胞、2.老化、3.癌症、4.細胞死亡、5.遺傳疾病、6.基因轉殖與剔除、7.人類基因體計劃、8.基因治療、9.複製人、10.基因改造食物、11.生物晶片、12.免疫與疫苗、13.人造器官、14.蛋白質結構生物學與生技製藥、15.未來展望。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講。
description.en: This course aims that the completion of human genome project will build up the prosperity of biotechnology industry. Enormous progress and propounding impacts from biotechnology will influence our future life. This class will focus on the latest developments of biology and interpret the tendency of biotechnology.The contents of this course include: 1.human embryonic stem cell、2.aging、3.Cancer、4.programmed cell death、5.Genetic diseases、6.Transgene and gene knock out、7.Heman genome project、8.Gene therapy、9.Heman cloning、10.Genetic modified food、11.Biochips、12.Immune System and Vaccine、13.Bioartificial organ、14.Structural Biology and Pharmaceutics、15.Future Prospect.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
